thread.title: Nordstrom Rack: Up to 70% Off TOMS Shoes
thread.title_full: Nordstrom Rack: Up to 70% Off TOMS Shoes

author: Kimberly (Stylish Sidekick)
title: Nordstrom Rack: Up to 70% Off TOMS Shoes
text:
Are you a fan of TOMS shoes? Through March 23rd, head over to Nordstrom Rack where they are hosting a TOMS shoe sale with prices marked up to 70% Off! Shipping is free on orders over $100; otherwise pay $5.95 – $7.95 on all other orders under $100.
Here are just a few of the deals I spotted… TOMS Americana Canvas Flag Shoe (Baby, Toddler, & Little Kid) 
Only $19.97 (reg. $36)
TOMS Knit Classic Slip-On Shoe (Little Kid & Big Kid) 
Only $21.97 (reg. $42)

TOMS Classic Knit Faux Shearling Lined Slip-On i Dark Grey or Natural 
Only $23.60 (reg. $59)

TOMS Faux Shearling Del Ray Sneaker 
Only $44.50 (reg. $89)
and Much MORE !
